alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 5:42PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Beauregard and northwestern Calcasieu Parishes, southern Newton and southeastern Jasper Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 541 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Stringtown to near Trout Creek to near Forest Heights. Movement was west at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Newton, Kirbyville, Merryville, Call, Deweyville, Starks, Evadale, Fields, Bon Weir, Buna, Gist, Trout Creek, Lunita, Bivens, Hartburg, Magnolia Springs, Old Salem, Mt. Union and Wrights Settlement. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
